page.title: 02A DAY OUT IN COWES
page.content: First of all I would come off the ferry and go to visit{The Royal Yacht {Squadron.(Cowes Castle)}.Then I would walk along the parade and go on a boat trip on the Jenny Lee.After that I would go along to{Egypt Point,} to see the lighthouse and have a paddle. I would go to{Northwood Park}and visit{Northwood House}and{Saint {Mary's church. After that I would have a game of bowls on{Prince's Green},or maybe tennis.Next I would walk along the High Street past Ruth's and Benzies on to Birmingham Road,Past Beken the photographers and{Westbourne House, the birthplace of Thomas Arnold, to the{Floating Bridge}crossing to East Cowes to view Norris Castle.
